en_US.project_summary: Messari brings transparency to the cryptoeconomy. We want to help investors, regulators, and the public make sense of this revolutionary new asset class, and are building data tools that will drive informed decision making and investment.

zh_CN.project_summary: Messari给加密经济带来了透明度。我们希望帮助投资者、监管者和公众了解这个革命性的新资产类别，并正在建立数据工具，以推动知情决策和投资。
